api:field.name: title
api:field.api:text: 7-Methoxybenzofuran-4-carboxamides as PDE 4 inhibitors: a potential treatment for asthma

api:field.name: abstract
api:field.api:text: The synthesis and pharmacological profile of a novel series of 7-methoxybenzofuran-4-carboxamides is described. Some of these compounds were found to be potent inhibitors of phosphodiesterase type 4 (PDE4). (C) 2000 Elsevier Science Ltd.
